message.raw: Major upgrades to distributor to deal handle multidimensional data distributions.  Layout creation is roughly the same, but initialization is more complicated due to custom computation of block sizes along each dimension, and allowing data to be embedded in a larger matrix (i.e. for FFTW R2C transforms).  The 'paths' between layouts are now instances of either the Transpose or Transform class.

The 'paths' between layouts are now instances of either the Transpose or Transform class.
